item.description:
A dinner meeting to discuss the formation of a Secular Coalition of Connecticut will be held.

David Niose (President of American Humanist Association) will be the special guest & speaker for the evening.

You need to register BY WEDNESDAY 9/21 at http://snaplink.org/SCCT

URGENT UPDATE: RSVPs CLOSE Wed. Sept. 21.

NO REFUNDS after Wed. Sept. 21.

Contact daisycheng@gmail.com for changes to RSVP. Daisy can arrange a refund if you know you won't be able to make it, but only until Wednesday - and don't leave it until Wednesday night, because that may be too late.
item.name: Founding meeting of the Secular Coalition for Connecticut
